message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but if you reject this, I know you'll be getting a bigger piece of the pie each round.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation.  Let's end this quickly.

Okay, I see you want more.  I'm willing to give you a bigger piece, but it's still not fair to me. Let's settle for 55/45.  If we keep going, I'll be getting less and less, and we'll never get to a fair agreement.
